messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Am I just  being na√Øv	e?
messages.messageBody:
From: "Olga" <britcontoo@...>

<<Well, I think most of us love when someone else does the cooking. It
is a different enjoyment all together. Maybe, it makes you feel like
a kid again when you were always taken care of or maybe it is the
pleasure of not doing the work! Either way, I love when someone
cooks for me, so I can see why kids love when we pamper them a little.>>


Yeah it is nice. Maybe that's why some women just love to go out to eat, no
one at home will do it for them!!! Then there's the other side of it and
people like me who also enjoy cooking for others too. I just love having a
house full and making a homemade dinner for everyone that they enjoy. I
especially enjoy Christmas for that reason. Not just that reason but it's
one of them.

Mary B
